Isiah Thomas

Pronunciation: \eye-ZAY-uh\

Isiah Lord Thomas III ▪ Twitter: IsiahThomas

(Zeke, The Baby-Faced Assassin, Tuss, Pocket Magic)

Position: Point Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-1, 180lb (185cm, 81kg)

Born: April 30, 1961 (Age: 62-090d) in Chicago, Illinois us

College: Indiana

High School: St. Joseph in Westchester, Illinois

Draft: Detroit Pistons, 1st round (2nd pick, 2nd overall), 1981 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 30, 1981

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2000 (Full List)

Career Length: 13 years

  • Hall of Fame
  • 12x All Star
  • 1984-85 AST Champ
  • 2x NBA Champ
  • 5x All-NBA
  • 1981-82 All-Rookie
  • 2x AS MVP
  • 1989-90 Finals MVP
  • NBA 75th Anniv. Team

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Isiah Thomas?

Isiah Thomas is 62 years old.

Where was Isiah Thomas born?

Isiah Thomas was born in Chicago, Illinois.

When was Isiah Thomas born?

Isiah Thomas was born on April 30, 1961.

How tall is Isiah Thomas?

Isiah Thomas is 6-1 (185 cm) tall.

How much did Isiah Thomas weigh when playing?

Isiah Thomas weighed 180 lbs (81 kg) when playing.

Is Isiah Thomas in the Hall of Fame?

Isiah Thomas was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2000 (Full List) .

When was Isiah Thomas drafted?

Isiah Thomas was drafted by Detroit Pistons, 1st round (2nd pick, 2nd overall), 1981 NBA Draft.

What position did Isiah Thomas play?

Point Guard.

When did Isiah Thomas retire?

Isiah Thomas last played in 1994.

What is Isiah Thomas' net worth?

Isiah Thomas made at least $16,681,000 playing professional basketball.

How much did Isiah Thomas make?

Isiah Thomas made $2,960,000 in 1992.

What did Isiah Thomas average?

Isiah Thomas averaged 19.2 points, 3.6 rebounds, and 9.3 assists per game.

How many rings does Isiah Thomas have?

Isiah Thomas won 2 championships.

What is Isiah Thomas' Twitter account?

Isiah Thomas is on Twitter at IsiahThomas.

What schools did Isiah Thomas attend?

Isiah Thomas attended St. Joseph in Westchester, Illinois and Indiana.

What are Isiah Thomas' nicknames?

Zeke, The Baby-Faced Assassin, Tuss, Pocket Magic are nicknames for Isiah Thomas.
